The four factors of stream-entry [sn12.4: Ethical conduct loved by the noble ones
The noble cycle that a noble disciple ha: Ignorance is a condition for choices
Choices are a condition for consciousness
Consciousness is a condition for name and form
Name and form are conditions for the six sense fields
The six sense fields are conditions for contact
Contact is a condition for feeling
Feeling is a condition for craving
Craving is a condition for grasping
Grasping is a condition for continued existence
Continued existence is a condition for rebirth
Rebirth is a condition for old age and death

That is how this entire mass of suffering originates. When ignorance fades away and ceases with nothing left over, choices cease. When choices cease, consciousness ceases. That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
